title: Paris under the Snow, Seen from the top of St. Gervais (Paris sous la neige, vu du haut de St. Gervais)
provenance_text:
The F. H. Bresler Co., Milwaukee WI, by 1926 [1]; sold to Kenneth Seaver [1877-1969], Pittsburgh, PA and Oakmont, PA, February 20, 1926 until June 4, 1947 [2]; gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, June 1947. 

Notes:
[1]. Located at 423 Milwaukee St. in Milwaukee.
[2]. Purchased for $350; see invoice information in curatorial file.
